sentences: The united nations aims to reduce net carbon emissions by 27% by the year 2030
Additional info: The claim is incorrect. The United Nations aims to reduce net carbon emissions by 45% by the year 2030, not 27%.

sentences: The UNO also wants the global carbon emissions to reach net 0 by year 2050
Additional info: The claim is supported by the Paris Agreement, which calls for a reduction of emissions by 45% by 2030 and reaching net zero by 2050.
